statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Let's define the number of '1' of X in base 2 is V(X).Now give you an X and a k, please give me the kth number Y strictly greater than X and V(X) = V(Y).

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Input includes several cases. Each case contains one line with two integers X, k. Input ends with a case X = 0 and k = 0. X is a 32-bit integer, 0 < K <= 50000.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Every case print a integer Y in a line. Y is guaranteed to be a 32-bit integer.
